# Bolster Spirits (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[0 Level Bard Spells|Bard 0]], [[0 Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 0]], [[0 Level Oracle Spells|Oracle 0]]

**BoXM:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Targets:** One creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 133

You instill courage in any [[Shaken|shaken]], [[Frightened|frightened]], or [[Panicked|panicked]] subject, speaking words to hearten and strengthen their spirits. If the subject is under the influence of a [[S3.1D-F - Universal Monster Rules D-F (Bestiary 6 Apx)|fear]] effect when receiving the spell, the subject may roll a second save against that effect.
